item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, August 28, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The journey of an internet packet: Exploring networks with traceroute (140 points | 38 comments)
2. Diffusion Models Are Real-Time Game Engines (806 points | 278 comments)
3. Formal CHERI: rigorous engineering and design-time proof of full-scale architect (55 points | 7 comments)
4. Show HN: IPA, a GUI for exploring inner details of PDF (Rust) (90 points | 15 comments)
5. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (1240 points | 400 comments)
6. US appeals court rules geofence warrants are unconstitutional (23 points | 2 comments)
7. Typing Lists and Tuples in Elixir (62 points | 8 comments)
8. A dishwasher can make or break a restaurant (65 points | 126 comments)
9. Cosmic Alpha Released (174 points | 91 comments)
10. Wp2hugo: Best WordPress to Hugo migrator (written in Go) (77 points | 25 comments)
11. Judge dismisses majority of GitHub Copilot copyright claims (57 points | 5 comments)
12. Prosper AI (YC S23) Hiring a Founding Front End Engineer in Barcelona (hybrid) ( | hide)
13. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Formaster Copy-Lock (14 points | discuss)
14. A Collection of Free Public APIs That Is Tested Daily (495 points | 97 comments)

20. ChartDB – Free and open source, database design editor (210 points | 26 comments)
21. Tesla’s TTPoE at Hot Chips 2024: Replacing TCP for Low Latency Applications (129 points | 71 comments)
22. The slow evaporation of the free/open source surplus (13 points | discuss)
23. Blitzortung – real time lightning strikes around the world (291 points | 117 comments)
24. Starting today, YouTube is almost unusable on Firefox (132 points | 117 comments)
25. Rerun: Visualize Multimodal Data over Time (119 points | 29 comments)
26. Sapiens: Foundation for Human Vision Models (27 points | 1 comment)
27. Sainsbury Wing contractors find 1990 letter from donor (339 points | 109 comments)
28. Fermilab is 'doomed' without management overhaul claims whistleblower report (46 points | 8 comments)
29. Unrealized Gain Tax–A Coming Sea Change in FY2025 Budget Proposal? (4 points | 1 comment)
30. Thoughts on the Durov Arrest (99 points | 149 comments)
